oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville Business - Coggin Chevrolet and National Casket Company
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Coggin Chevrolet showroom on Woodland Street is now occupied by "The Trap" restaurant and nightclub. The adjacent four story building, since demolished, housed the National Casket Company which started business in Nashville in 1899. 35mm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Coggin Chevrolet; National Casket Company
Business
Nashville (Tenn.); Woodland Street
